General.Name: Saudi Pharmaceutical Appliances
General.Description: Saudi Pharmaceutical Industries and Medical Appliances Corporation develops, manufactures, and markets medicinal and pharmaceutical products in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia. The company is also involved in the manufacturing of basic chemical substances and products; medicines for human use, including cosmetics, as well as engages in wholesale and retail of medicines and related products. It operates and maintains healthcare facilities. In addition, the company engages in the research and development of medical science activities. The company was founded in 1986 and is based in Buraydah, the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.
General.Address: King Abdul Aziz Road, Buraydah, Saudi Arabia
